short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage, generate, and share passwords securely with local encryption and zero cloud storage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DontSpoof Vault is the ultimate password management solution for privacy-conscious users. Designed with security at its core, this extension provides powerful tools to securely store, generate, and share passwords—all without relying on cloud storage. Your data stays encrypted and local, ensuring complete privacy and control.

Key Features:
----------------------
- Password Vault: Store and organize your passwords with advanced AES-GCM encryption.
- Password Generator: Create strong, customizable passwords with user-defined criteria.
- Secure Sharing: Share passwords with trusted contacts using encrypted messages and unique User IDs.
- Backup and Restore: Export and import your encrypted password vault to ensure your data is safe and portable.
- Session Management: Access your vault only during active sessions for enhanced security.
- User-Friendly Interface: Simple tab-based layout for easy navigation—Generator, Vault, and Share Password.

Why Choose DontSpoof Vault?
--------------------------------------------------
- Privacy-First: No cloud storage. Your data stays on your device, encrypted with AES-GCM.
- Transparency: Open about how your data is managed. Review our Privacy Policy.
Advanced Features: Unique User ID and passphrase system for secure password sharing.

How It Works:
----------------------
Set a Master Password: Start with a master password and passphrase for double-layer security.

- Add Your Credentials: Save your passwords in an encrypted vault.
- Generate Strong Passwords: Create secure passwords for new accounts in seconds.
- Share Passwords Securely: Encrypt passwords with a passphrase and send them to trusted contacts using their User ID.

Resources:
-----------------
- User Documentation
https://dontspoof.com/dontspoof-vault-user-documentation/

Privacy Policy
https://dontspoof.com/dontspoof-vault-privacy-policy/

Permissions Required:
-----------------------------------
Storage: Used to securely save encrypted passwords and settings locally.
Clipboard Access: Temporarily copy passwords for user convenience (cleared automatically for security).

DontSpoof Vault is designed to give you the ultimate control over your passwords while keeping them secure and private.

Download now and experience the next level of secure password management!
